message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $60, you get $40.  We both win something.
I think I deserve a bit more, Alice. How about I get $55 and you get $45? We both still win something.
Bob, my friend, this is the best offer you'll get. Take it while it's still worth something!
Alice, I think we can do better than that. How about I get $52 and you get $48? It's a fair compromise.
